string.name: wp_questionnaires_tutorial_overview
string.context: Tutorial text introducing the questionnaires (A Few Questions) activity to the patient. %%QUESTIONNAIRES is replaced with the name of the activity.

resources.string: %%QUESTIONNAIRES lets you share more information with your providers. If you run into trouble while filling out a questionnaire, reach out to your care team.

string.name: wp_questionnaires_tutorial_overview_proxy
string.context: Tutorial text introducing the questionnaires (A Few Questions) activity to the patient proxy. %%QUESTIONNAIRES is replaced with the name of the activity. %%PATNAME is replaced with the name of the patient

resources.string: %%QUESTIONNAIRES lets you share more information with %%PATNAME\'s providers. If you run into trouble while filling out a questionnaire, reach out to %%PATNAME\'s care team.

string.name: wp_questionnaires_tutorial_overview_2
string.context: Tutorial text explaining more about the workings of questionnaires to the patient.

resources.string: After you complete a questionnaire, it will be visible to your care team right away. If you submit a questionnaire but want to go back and change your answers, reach out to your care team.

string.name: wp_questionnaires_tutorial_overview_2_proxy
string.context: Tutorial text explaining more about the workings of questionnaires to the patient proxy. %%PATNAME is replaced with the name of the patient

resources.string: After you complete a questionnaire, it will be visible to %%PATNAME\'s care team right away. If you submit a questionnaire but want to go back and change your answers, reach out to %%PATNAME\'s care team.

string.name: wp_questionnaires_tutorial_mfq
string.context: Tutorial text explaining that some questionnaires are expected to be answered more than once

resources.string: Some questionnaires can be answered multiple times during your stay.

string.name: wp_questionnaires_tutorial_mfq_proxy
string.context: Tutorial text explaining that some questionnaires are expected to be answered more than once. %%PATNAME is replaced with the name of the patient

resources.string: Some questionnaires can be answered multiple times during %%PATNAME\'s stay.
